cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP data port for CU to 0 will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between CU and DU, preventing F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting minimum RX/TX time to a negative value (-1) will cause physical layer timing configuration errors and prevent proper frame synchronization.
du.explanation_zh: 將最小 RX/TX 時間設定為負值 (-1)，會導致實體層時序配置錯誤，並阻止正確的幀同步。
